Counter-Strike has become a classic PC shooter. It's multiplayer focus has stayed true to itself over the course of 20 years, but manages to stay fresh with new maps and game modes. Counter-Strike remains one of the best skill-based shooters around due to the easy to learn mechanics and focused maps. Don't be fooled, even a seasoned vet can learn a few things 20 years later. Map tactics and teamwork allow CS-GO to rise above your average multiplayer shooters.
If you don't have this game in your steam library already, you have probably had steam for only a week.
